This Quarto doc will walk through the process of creating the FEMA high risk flooding polygon needed to calculate the percentage of school areas within high risk flood zones.

```{r}
# Load the libraries needed for the analysis
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(terra)
library(ggplot2)
library(tmap)
```


```{r}
# read in FEMA data for entire state
FEMA_state <- st_read("/capstone/casaschools/fema-data/NFHL_06_20240401/NFHL_06_20240401.gdb",
                      layer = "S_FLD_HAZ_AR",
                      quiet = TRUE)

plot(FEMA_state$geometry)
```
